UniprotID	Q96BW5
Accession	Q96BW5;B0YJ77;B3KTF5;D3DRU0;Q9BY46
EntryName	PTER_HUMAN
ProteinName	N-acetyltaurine hydrolase (EC 3.1.-.-) (Phosphotriesterase-related protein)
GeneName	PTER
Length	349
Function	N-acetyltaurine hydrolase that regulates feeding by catalyzing the hydrolysis of N-acetyltaurine into taurine and acetate (PubMed:39112712). N-acetyltaurine has anorexigenic and anti-obesity effects that are dependent on GFRAL receptor and GDF15 (By similarity). PTER also acts on other N-acetyl amino acids (Met, Ile, Leu, Val) and N-propionyltaurine, but at lower rates (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol
Disorder	0.3286,0.2503,0.2884,0.2193,0.1823,0.2364,0.3019,0.3215,0.3392,0.2884,0.3087,0.3426,0.3494,0.2817,0.3529,0.3631,0.3840,0.3910,0.3740,0.3426,0.3087,0.3667,0.3321,0.3460,0.3249,0.2918,0.1969,0.1028,0.1251,0.1501,0.2364,0.2680,0.1759,0.1791,0.2645,0.2328,0.1611,0.1449,0.1399,0.2164,0.2752,0.2292,0.1759,0.2364,0.2193,0.3182,0.3321,0.3321,0.3392,0.2328,0.2094,0.1791,0.1611,0.2224,0.1449,0.1298,0.1501,0.2094,0.2328,0.2470,0.1611,0.1424,0.1449,0.1969,0.2328,0.2575,0.2503,0.3392,0.3948,0.4087,0.4831,0.4940,0.5254,0.4369,0.3910,0.3910,0.2988,0.2884,0.2680,0.2575,0.2470,0.3182,0.3117,0.3599,0.2817,0.2164,0.2164,0.2224,0.2064,0.2364,0.3149,0.3215,0.2258,0.2064,0.2783,0.3631,0.4507,0.5620,0.5758,0.5176,0.5017,0.5055,0.4292,0.4017,0.4476,0.5456,0.6269,0.5992,0.5139,0.5139,0.4292,0.3494,0.3460,0.4256,0.4017,0.3983,0.2918,0.2034,0.1449,0.1528,0.1914,0.2002,0.2034,0.2752,0.2988,0.2988,0.2849,0.2817,0.2575,0.2918,0.2849,0.2988,0.3948,0.4017,0.3215,0.3529,0.3667,0.3983,0.4051,0.4369,0.4330,0.4801,0.3910,0.3087,0.3149,0.3149,0.2680,0.2752,0.2715,0.3019,0.3249,0.2436,0.2988,0.1969,0.1914,0.1881,0.1184,0.1115,0.1731,0.1671,0.1942,0.1206,0.1070,0.1007,0.1852,0.1184,0.1229,0.1611,0.1528,0.1702,0.1643,0.1611,0.1791,0.1184,0.1942,0.1671,0.2503,0.3053,0.3087,0.2609,0.3529,0.3249,0.4186,0.3356,0.4292,0.3087,0.4220,0.3566,0.2541,0.1759,0.1611,0.1914,0.1969,0.2575,0.3392,0.3286,0.3566,0.3215,0.3840,0.2783,0.3149,0.2224,0.1702,0.1643,0.1611,0.1028,0.1731,0.1583,0.1852,0.2645,0.3149,0.3215,0.2034,0.2034,0.2034,0.2094,0.1501,0.1275,0.1501,0.1275,0.1424,0.1424,0.2129,0.3053,0.2193,0.2193,0.3117,0.2988,0.2783,0.3249,0.2399,0.1881,0.1942,0.1759,0.1528,0.1611,0.0967,0.1399,0.1070,0.0618,0.0349,0.0646,0.0341,0.0356,0.0209,0.0191,0.0300,0.0294,0.0327,0.0198,0.0115,0.0181,0.0178,0.0168,0.0184,0.0218,0.0244,0.0443,0.0248,0.0443,0.0631,0.1275,0.1206,0.2002,0.2064,0.2884,0.3948,0.3019,0.2988,0.2849,0.3019,0.3910,0.3019,0.3053,0.2258,0.3286,0.3460,0.3149,0.2292,0.3356,0.3356,0.3704,0.2503,0.1611,0.1
